about_the_game:
Introduction

《Milk way Subway 》is a 2D sci-fi suspense RPG and puzzle game. Humanity has developed a new habitable zone in universe. The story begins with a hacking accident named [ember]. The collective failure of the networked devices caused great damage and casualties, and at the same time a mysterious 20-sided polyhedron- UD3718. you will play a role named Millai, joined a scientific research organization called “C.O.S.M.I.C.” to pursue the truth of the accident that took your mother's life.

Meetings, trust, betrayal, confrontation; inhuman research, difficult puzzles, time and space entanglements, non-carbon-based civilizations... As for how to face these “truths” and the even more confusing so-called “destiny” behind them, it may be the first step you really need to take ......

The story begins with a large-scale cyber hacking accident called EMBER - “gifts” from the cosmic, intercepted “prophecies” signal, illusion... Behind these mysteries, you'll go on a journey across time and space. The clouds of suspicion expand with the adventure, and the truth of the accident is even more confusing. ......


The player hacks the device to obtain clues in the form of puzzles. The puzzles allow the player to control two entangled particles with different spin directions, which will move in different directions. The player needs to make full use of the mechanism to get them to the specified location. Solved puzzles can light up stars on the panel to advance the plot.

The player play the role named miallai, a novice researcher seeking the truth of the ember incident, where she sees a figure that seems to be familiar but also completely unfamiliar. The team leader, Octo, who is usually a jokester but has a sense of justice in critical moments，seems to remind her of the young girl with star-like eyes in her childhood memories. What will be the story of their fated encounter?


Staff

Art/developer Plasmafall

copywriter Ada Oakrin

music Yolanda

TA grey the fish

twi/x：@plasmafall

name: 终末列车

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: inter i4 5代及以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX750
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: MilkwaySubway is a 2D puzzle RPG with Sci-fi theme. The story begins with an accident called [ember] resulting in casualties by hacking in electronic device. You will play a role named Millai to investigate this accident and venture across with your companies until finding the truth of EMBER
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
